001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity;
002
003import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
004import androidx.room.Entity;
005import androidx.room.Ignore;
006import androidx.room.Index;
007import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
008import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
009import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.BadCodeLengthException;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.BadGuessLengthException;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.BadPoolException;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.CharacterNotInPoolException;
014import java.util.Date;
015import java.util.LinkedList;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import kotlin.jvm.Transient;
020
021@Entity(
022    tableName = "game",
023    indices = @Index(value = "key", unique = true)
024)
025public class Game {
026
027  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
028  @ColumnInfo(name = "game_id")
029  private int id;
030
031  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
032  @SerializedName("id")
033  private String key;
034
035  @Expose
036  private String pool;
037
038  @Expose
039  @ColumnInfo(index = true)
040  private int length;
041
042  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
043  @Ignore
044  private final List<Guess> guesses;
045
046  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
047  @SerializedName("created")
048  private Date start;
049
050  { // Initialization block, runs before constructors
051    guesses = new LinkedList<>();
052  }
053  public Game() {
054  }
055
056  public Game(String pool, int length) throws BadCodeLengthException, BadPoolException {
057    if (length <= 0) {
058      throw new BadCodeLengthException();
059    }
060    if (pool.isEmpty()) {
061      throw new BadPoolException();
062    }
063    this.pool = pool;
064    this.length = length;
065    key = null;
066    start = null;
067  }
068
069  public Guess validate(String content) throws BadGuessLengthException, CharacterNotInPoolException {
070    if (codePointLength(content) != length) {
071      throw new BadGuessLengthException();
072    }
073    Set<Integer> poolCodePoints = getCodePointSet(pool);
074    Set<Integer> contentCodePoints = getCodePointSet(content);
075    if (!poolCodePoints.containsAll(contentCodePoints)) {
076      throw new CharacterNotInPoolException();
077    }
078    return new Guess(content);
079  }
080
081  public int getId() {
082    return id;
083  }
084
085  public void setId(int id) {
086    this.id = id;
087  }
088
089  public String getKey() {
090    return key;
091  }
092
093  public void setKey(String key) {
094    this.key = key;
095  }
096
097  public String getPool() {
098    return pool;
099  }
100
101  public void setPool(String pool) {
102    this.pool = pool;
103  }
104
105  public int getLength() {
106    return length;
107  }
108
109  public void setLength(int length) {
110    this.length = length;
111  }
112
113  public Date getStart() {
114    return start;
115  }
116
117  public void setStart(Date start) {
118    this.start = start;
119  }
120
121  public List<Guess> getGuesses() {
122    return guesses;
123  }
124
125  public boolean isSolved() {
126    List<Guess> guesses = getGuesses();
127    return !guesses.isEmpty() && guesses.get(guesses.size()-1).getCorrect() == length;
128  }
129
130  private Set<Integer> getCodePointSet(String src) {
131    return src
132        .codePoints()
133        .boxed()
134        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
135  }
136  private int codePointLength(String src) {
137    return (int) src
138        .codePoints()
139        .count();
140  }
141
142}
